Posts.Content: Feb 15, 2017 02:09PM zooliferus63 wrote: I know this is an old post but yes I had the nuclear injections and that is one of the worst pains I've have experienced. Acid came to mind to me too. I was instructed to apply the lotion on one hour before the procedure - I can't imagine the pain I would have if I hadn't applied the lotion. I don't mean to scare anyone and I know it is necessary to find the Sentinel Nodes.
Posts.Title: Nuclear Injection pre-surgery pagowens Accepted2018
